entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: SSW 36 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow and local blowing snow beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy after midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
